author.bio:
I am passionate about continual self-improvement and learning, working in Agile Scrum environments to
produce clean, usable and accessible applications. I love all things .Net, JS and Cloud Native.

group.title: Your job won't fix your career

group.excerpt: Warning to the 9-5 developers out there. Don't rely on your job to provide you with the experience to further your career.
